title: Print, "Escallier du comte d'Albemarle a Voorte (Stairs of the Count d'Albemarle de Voorste), in Nouveaux livres de peintures de salles et d’escaliers (New Books on Paintings for Rooms and Stairs)", ca. 1700
medium: Etching and engraving on white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, lower left: Escallier du comte d'Albemarle a Voorte du d Esien de Marot / Marot invente et desinée Sur La place et / gravée auec previllege des Etats Generaux des / Provinces Unie et d Holande et West friese
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Classical architectural structure with stairs leading below. It is decorated with fluted Corinthian columns, scenes in relief, and sculptures. Draped figures sit at the center; a large group of classical figures on clouds float above.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Escallier du comte d'Albemarle a Voorte (Stairs of the Count d'Albemarle de Voorste), in Nouveaux livres de peintures de salles et d’escaliers (New Books on Paintings for Rooms and Stairs)", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Etching and engraving on white laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-38.
